remarks: The sum of two group sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 5-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumzadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzadd.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumzadd.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzadd.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzadd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzadd.fn $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumzadd.hn $e |- ( ph -> H finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumzadd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
gsumzadd.c $e |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Z ` S ) ) $.
gsumzadd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
gsumzadd.h $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> S ) $.
gsumzadd $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
